name: Aventador SVJ
description: A naturally aspirated V12 beast delivering 759 hp, combining Italian design with extreme performance and aerodynamics.

name: M8 Competition
description: A luxurious high-performance coupe with 617 hp and a 0-60 time of just 3 seconds.

name: Chiron Super Sport 300+
description: Quad-turbocharged W16 hypercar capable of exceeding 300 mph, redefining automotive performance limits.

name: X6 M Competition
description: A coupe-styled SUV with aggressive design, 617 hp, and M-tuned handling dynamics.

name: G-Class AMG G63
description: Iconic boxy SUV blending luxury with off-road capability, powered by a handcrafted AMG V8.

name: Cayenne Turbo GT
description: Porsche’s most powerful Cayenne, blending SUV practicality with sports car performance. Features a twin-turbo V8, track-tuned chassis, and blistering acceleration.

name: SF90 Stradale
description: Ferrari’s first plug-in hybrid supercar with 986 hp and jaw-dropping Italian styling.

name: Cullinan
description: The pinnacle of SUV luxury with bespoke craftsmanship, comfort, and presence.

name: MC20
description: A lightweight carbon-fiber chassis and 621 hp twin-turbo V6 deliver Italian performance with elegance.

name: RS e-tron GT
description: Audi’s flagship electric sports sedan with 637 hp, quattro AWD, and luxurious tech-filled interior.

name: AMG One
description: Formula 1 technology brought to the streets, featuring a hybrid powertrain with over 1,000 hp.

name: Valhalla
description: Mid-engined hybrid supercar blending Aston Martin elegance with cutting-edge performance.

name: Urus Performante
description: A high-performance luxury SUV delivering speed, agility, and Lamborghini’s iconic styling.

name: LaFerrari
description: Ferrari’s flagship hybrid hypercar with a V12 engine and F1-derived KERS system.

name: Bentayga Speed
description: The world’s fastest luxury SUV, combining handcrafted luxury with a 626 hp W12 engine.
